track_unlock_explore: Track your cubes, unlock badges, and explore the world's largest cube database.
ready_to_level_up: Ready to level up your cube game?
join_community: Join the CubeIndex community and start tracking your collection, unlocking achievements, and connecting with cubers worldwide.
cubingpanda_community: CubingPanda is the go-to community for Rubik's Cube fans at every skill level‚Äîwhether you're a veteran speedcuber or someone who's never solved a single face.
open_archive_algorithms: The open archive for cube algorithms. Browse community-vetted solutions across every puzzle type, tag them with your average-of-5, and share your PB-crushing secrets.

base_version: The base version is the original or standard version of this cube model.
limited_version: Limited Edition versions are produced in restricted quantities and may feature unique colors, packaging, or other special characteristics.
trim_version: Trim versions are alternate variants of the base model, often with different colors, finishes, or minor features.
